meanings.definition: The quality or state of being strange or odd.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit stood out because of its queerness.
meanings.sent2: The queerness of the situation made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The queerness of the cat wearing a hat made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: The queerness of the old house gave it a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent5: The queerness of the plant's growth pattern fascinated the botanist.

meanings.definition: A deviation from the normal or expected.
meanings.sent1: The sudden queerness in his behavior worried his friends.
meanings.sent2: The queerness of the weather caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent3: The queerness of the dog wearing sunglasses made heads turn.
meanings.sent4: The queerness of the road led them to a hidden gem of a cafe.
meanings.sent5: The queerness of the painting's colors made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A feeling or expression of nonconformity or difference.
meanings.sent1: Her queerness shone through in her unique style.
meanings.sent2: The queerness of his ideas challenged the status quo.
meanings.sent3: The queerness of the penguin wearing a bow tie was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The queerness of the music touched the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The queerness of the sculpture made it a controversial piece.
